column1: Cavs return to practice Kevin Love still slowed by back
column2: INDEPENDENCE Ohio (AP)LeBron Jamesstayed on the floor after practice to go over plays with Cleveland's coaches and work on his post-up game. He knows what's ahead.

column1: Knight's rise could determine future of Suns' offense
column2: PHOENIX-- As their lingering offensive swoon escorts theSunsback into the NBA draft lottery let's revisit an observation from Markieff Morris.

column1: Adios Oubre: Jayhawks freshman declares for '15 NBA Draft
column2: KANSAS CITY Mo.-- Kelly Oubre was always a rental. So in perhaps the least surprising declaration of NBA Declaration Week Kansas' gifted wing guard announced Wednesday that he's forgoing his remaining collegiate eligibility for the professional ranks.

column1: Anthony Davis: James Harden should win MVP
column2: New Orleans Pelicans forward Anthony Davis is averaging 24.7 points and 10.4 rebounds per game. He leads the NBA in blocks and PER (with an incredible 31.1) and is a nightly highlight reel whom basketball fans can't stop drooling over.
